betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oGiven a template from the genetic transposer, you can use the imprinter to modify a bee's genes.

If you want to imprint a queen, you will have to imprint both a princess and a drone, and the resulting queen will be guaranteed to have the desired genes.

WARNING: bees have a (low) chance of being turned into genetic waste, so be careful about imprinting princesses. If you want to avoid losing a princess, imprint a lot of drones, and reiteratively combine them into queens until you have all the desired genes.

§fCan I make my bees Harder, Better, Faster, Stronger? Heck yeah I can!
